speaker: Archmage
lines: 'Yet that weakness is what makes you strong.'
'You are worthy of the path of knowlege.
He pulls a lever on the wall, revealing a hidden door.
'Come with me child, and I will teach you the ways of the mage.'
Following him into the hidden door brings you to a magical room full of plants and herbs you have never seen before.
Light of different colors are emanating from the plants and herbs, you can feel the energy of the plants and herbs filling the room.
In the middle of the room is a pedastal with a staff floating just above it.
This is the TRUE path to knowlege.
Never give up on your soul, it is the only thing that will keep you alive.
The Archmage hands you the staff.
As he does, he fades away, leaving you alone in the room with the staff.

give_item.name: Staff of Knowledge
give_item.description: A staff that carries lessons more than force

choices.text: Leave the room without taking the staff.
